meanings.definition: The main circuit board in a computer that connects all the components together.
meanings.sent1: The motherboards in computers are like the glue that holds everything together.
meanings.sent2: When building a computer, it is important to choose a reliable motherboards.
meanings.sent3: Why did the computer go to therapy? It had issues with its motherboards!
meanings.sent4: The motherboards of the computer were the unsung heroes, silently connecting all the parts.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the motherboards fascinated the computer enthusiasts.

meanings.definition: A board that serves as the foundation or base for other components in a system.
meanings.sent1: The sturdy motherboards provided a solid base for the entire system.
meanings.sent2: In construction, a strong foundation starts with reliable motherboards.
meanings.sent3: Why did the house break up with the foundation? It found a better match with the motherboards!
meanings.sent4: The motherboards of the system were like the roots of a tree, supporting everything above.
meanings.sent5: The importance of quality motherboards cannot be overstated in any system.
